SELECT POST_TITLE AS postTitle, CMT_CONTENT AS cmtContent, CMT_DATETIME AS cmtDateTime, CMT_LIKE AS cmtLike, POST_INDEX AS postIndex FROM (SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_TBL.*,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CMT_DATETIME DESC) AS NUM FROM BOARD_COMMENT_TBL WHERE MB_INDEX = #{mbIndex}) BCT JOIN BOARD_POST_TBL BPT USING(POST_INDEX) WHERE BCT.MB_INDEX = (SELECT DISTINCT MB_INDEX FROM BOARD_COMMENT_TBL WHERE MB_INDEX = #{mbIndex}) AND NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT BPT.POST_TITLE as postTitle, BPT.POST_HIT as postHit, BPT.POST_INDEX as postIndex, BCA_INDEX AS bcaIndex, POST_LIKE as postLike, BPT.MB_INDEX as mbIndex,MB_ID as mbId FROM (SELECT BOARD_BOOKMARK_TBL.*,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BMK_INDEX DESC) AS NUM FROM BOARD_BOOKMARK_TBL WHERE MB_INDEX = 1) BMK JOIN BOARD_POST_TBL BPT ON(BPT.POST_INDEX = BMK.POST_INDEX) JOIN MEMBER_TBL MBT ON(BMK.MB_INDEX= MBT.MB_INDEX) WHERE BMK.MB_INDEX = #{mbIndex}

SELECT QS_INDEX AS qsIndex, QS_TITLE AS qsTitle, QS_CONTENT AS qsContent, MB_NICKNAME AS mbNickName, QS_WRITETIME AS qsWriteTime, QS_ANSWERCHECK AS qsAnswerCheck, ANS_CONTENT AS ansContent FROM MEMBER_TBL JOIN QUESTION_TBL USING (MB_INDEX) LEFT OUTER JOIN ANSWER_TBL USING(QS_INDEX) WHERE QS_INDEX = #{qsIndex}
